ðŸ“– Summary: OpenMeter provides a flexible metering and billing solution for AI and DevTool companies. It collects and aggregates millions of usage events in real-time, enabling usage-based billing, real-time insights, and usage limit enforcement. The platform offers a REST API and client SDKs for easy integration.
